@graph.name: Baked Vegan Firecracker Tofu Wings - Vegan Richa
@graph.description: Sweet and Spicy Crispy Baked Firecracker Tofu Wings - an addictive vegan appetizer that will leave you wanting more.

@graph.name: Vegan Firecracker Tofu Wings
@graph.description: Sweet and Spicy Crispy Baked Firecracker Tofu Wings - an addictive vegan appetizer that will leave you wanting more. This is a super easy and delicious Asian-inspired tofu recipe that's perfect for Game Day, parties, movie night, or any occasion that calls for crowd-pleasing snacks.
recipeIngredient: 12 to 14 oz pack of extra firm tofu (pressed for 15 mins then sliced into thin strips)

recipeInstructions.text: Make the firecracker sauce, add all the ingredients in a shallow cooking pan. Heat the sauce over medium heat, whisk well to incorporate cornstarch and sugar until well combined
recipeInstructions.name: Make the firecracker sauce, add all the ingredients in a shallow cooking pan. Heat the sauce over medium heat, whisk well to incorporate cornstarch and sugar until well combined

recipeInstructions.text: Bring the mixture to a boil, sauce will thicken slightly so keep whisking.  Simmer for 1 minute then switch off the heat, let the sauce cool to a warm state so that it  thickens a bit more
recipeInstructions.name: Bring the mixture to a boil, sauce will thicken slightly so keep whisking.  Simmer for 1 minute then switch off the heat, let the sauce cool to a warm state so that it  thickens a bit more

recipeInstructions.text: In the meantime, slice your tofu if you haven’t already and dip strips in the sauce using tongs, the coating on all sides.
recipeInstructions.name: In the meantime, slice your tofu if you haven’t already and dip strips in the sauce using tongs, the coating on all sides.

recipeInstructions.text: Make your breadcrumb coating, mix well and place in a shallow bowl
recipeInstructions.name: Make your breadcrumb coating, mix well and place in a shallow bowl

recipeInstructions.text: Dip tofu slices from the sauce into the breadcrumb mixture, coating all sides again. Place on a parchment-lined baking sheet. Repeat for all tofu strips
recipeInstructions.name: Dip tofu slices from the sauce into the breadcrumb mixture, coating all sides again. Place on a parchment-lined baking sheet. Repeat for all tofu strips

recipeInstructions.text: Bake at 400℉ for 20-25 minutes or until crisp
recipeInstructions.name: Bake at 400℉ for 20-25 minutes or until crisp

recipeInstructions.text: Serve these strips with the remaining firecracker sauce on the side, or add all the strips to the firecracker pan and toss well to coat, using tongs to turn each piece to coat and cook together, serving immediately.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve these strips with the remaining firecracker sauce on the side, or add all the strips to the firecracker pan and toss well to coat, using tongs to turn each piece to coat and cook together, serving immediately.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve with vegan ranch and top with thinly sliced green onions or scallions
recipeInstructions.name: Serve with vegan ranch and top with thinly sliced green onions or scallions

@graph.keywords: firecracker tofu, tofu wings, vegan crispy tofu
